story.storykicker: A three-BHK is priced over Rs 9.10 crore and a five-BHK at Rs 10.5 crore, Ghosh said. The residence overlooks the Arabian Sea, the Bandra Worli Sea-Link with a horse-racing track. The skyscraper will be tightly protected by a seven-tier security system of surveillance cameras, swipe cards, special car tags and an army of private guards.
story.storybody:
A look at his exploits in India offers a glimpse into Trump's buccaneering business acumen that runs contrary to his demagoguery back home as a politician. The billionaire US presidential candidate has his name emblazoned on Trump Tower - a highly sought-after real estate across the globe. Two of his projects made their debut in India three years ago, much before the American tycoon made his political debut. As rising wealth bolstered demands for branded homes in India, Trump seized on the trend and launched his Trump Tower luxury apartment in Mumbai and Pune.

A look

India Today TV took an exclusive tour of the Mumbai project, scheduled to be completed in 2018. The under-construction, highest-end residential complex offers a private jet service for the residents, a facility that has so far been unheard of in the city's most elite apartments. With a trademark gold-coloured facade, the 75-storeyed tower is being built by Mumbai's Lodha Group on a private lush-green park.

"Trump attracts the richest citizens of society, that includes CEOs, industrialists, cricketers, celebrities and high net-worth individuals," Samujjwal Ghosh, Lodha Group's executive vice-president and marketing head, told India Today TV. Mumbai's 800-foot tall shimmering Trump Tower is being raised on 17 acres, with 400-odd apartments.

A three-BHK is priced over Rs 9.10 crore and a five-BHK at Rs 10.5 crore, Ghosh said. The residence overlooks the Arabian Sea, the Bandra Worli Sea-Link with a horse-racing track. The skyscraper will be tightly protected by a seven-tier security system of surveillance cameras, swipe cards, special car tags and an army of private guards.

It is equipped with jacuzzis, waterfalls, swimming pools, spas, picnic spots, a cricket ground, athletic tracks and an amphitheatre. His anti-India rhetoric in the American presidential campaign aside, businessman Donald Trump appears to be quite bullish on India.

The Trump-branded residential and office projects are being planned in Delhi, Bangalore, Chennai, Hyderabad and Goa among other cities with a strong appetite for branded properties, industry sources said.

Also read: For residents of Trump Tower in Mumbai, a private jet service

The residence overlooks the Arabian Sea, the Bandra Worli Sea-Link with a horse-racing track. The skyscraper will be tightly protected by a seven-tier security system of surveillance cameras, swipe cards, special car tags and an army of private guards.

The flats are equipped with jacuzzis
